pageTitle: MotorGuide Saltwater Transom-mount Trolling Motor Hand Control - iboats.com
textBeforeTable: Quiet, smooth operation lets you get closer to the fish without spooking it Ultra-pure aluminum coating providing added protection Features of MotorGuide Saltwater Transom-Mount Trolling Motor Hand Control Anodized aluminum mounts and components prevent galvanic corrosion Machete III propeller for ultimate shallow water performance Ergonomic extending handle for superior control This control operates so silently that you can go very close to the fish. It also features Machete III propeller that operates quietly to deliver the ultimate shallow water performance. Designed to be mounted on to the transom, the MotorGuide Saltwater Trolling Motor Hand Control provides superior steering control. It has a steel magnetic housing with aluminum coating to resist corrosion due to salt water and offer protection from scratches. Shipping Customer Questions & Answers Description
textAfterTable: Ask a question for MotorGuide Saltwater Edition Trolling Motor, 82 lb Thrust, 45" Shaft, 09 Mount, 24V - Hand Control MotorGuide Saltwater Edition Trolling Motor, 105 lb Thrust, 50" Shaft, 09 Mount, 36V - Hand Control Question & Answer Guidelines This product ships in 1 business day.
